summary: Update the existing blog homepage to focus on anime, movie, and book reviews with Ronel as the site owner, including authentication functionality and image upload capabilities for review content

page.name: HomePage
page.description: The main landing page that showcases Ronel's review blog focused on anime, movies, and books. Features a personalized header with Ronel's branding, a grid of recent reviews with cover images, filtering options by content type (anime/movies/books), and authentication functionality allowing Ronel to sign in with a password to manage and add new review posts with images. The page maintains the feminine aesthetic while adapting the content to focus specifically on entertainment media reviews.
